td.content: shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate weight loss over several months, moderate nausea, moderate weakness and Cancer. These symptoms are present for about 9 days. patient is a M technologist aged 31 ys. o:Height 66 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 96, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

td.content: s:male technologist aged 31 yrs presents without complaints. pt denies weakness, weight loss over several months and nausea. o:Height 66 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 96, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 1 (new patient) - Completed.

s:pt presents with 2 years history of moderate nausea. he is a 31 yo m. Denies ever using tobacco he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 65 in, Weight 202 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:a 31 year old male technologist presents with moderate weight loss over several months, moderate nausea. pt also reports of moderate weakness. o:Height 66 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered EGD.

s:pt presents with progressive moderate nausea, moderate weakness and moderate weight loss over several months for past 7 days. he is a 31 YO M technologist. o:Height 66 in, Weight 209 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed.
